Posts.Content: I would be more than happy to talk to you about this "horrible" disease.  I was diagnosed in Oct. 2006 with IBC and in Jan, 2008 I was diagnosed with brain and liver mets.  My email is --Message edited by CancerCompass staff. For personal protection, email address removed. Consider private reply. Please review CancerCompass Member Guidelines at http://www.cancercompass.com/common/guidelines.html--  I would be willing to discuss this with you. Thanks for trying to get the word out Lesa
Posts.Title: Women living with Inflammatory Breast Cancer

Posts.Content: Hello, I was diagnosed with inflammatory breast cancer in Oct. 2006.  It is a ER+, Her2/neuro+, and PR- type of cancer. I have undergone chemo, mastectomy and radiation.  I was taking Herceptin and Tamoxifen.  My last scans revealed cancer mets in my liver and brain and 3 new tumors have formed on my other breast.  I am currently undergoing whole brain radiation in an attempt to shrink the brain met.  I was just wanting to know if there is anyone else out there going through this or have already gone through this type of cancer and treatment. Any help and advice would be very much appreciated. Thanks!!!
Posts.Title: Inflammatory breast cancer metastisized

Posts.Content: Thanks for the info.  I most certainly will check this out. Thanks again!!! Lesa.
Posts.Title: Inflammatory breast cancer metastisized
